projects.name: Website OpenSea
projects.description: OpenSea is a platform that allows users to create, trade, collect and auction NFTs (Non-Fungible Tokens) from digital files such as images, videos, music and trade with a global community.

projects.name: Website e-commerce
projects.description: An e-commerce website is used to showcase products, allow users to browse, purchase, and make payments online, helping businesses automate their sales process over the internet.

projects.name: Website Music Player
projects.description: A music player website that allows users to browse, listen, manage songs or playlists online, providing an easy and interactive way to enjoy music anytime.
